sn9.10:1.2: The verb saṅkasāyati is a synonym of allīyati, to stick or adhere to (Kd 3:1.2.3).
sn9.10:2.1: At AN 4.191:1.7, dhammapada refers to all nine categories of the teaching, and I think it has the same sense here.
sn9.10:3.1: The sense of this unusual five-line verse is not entirely clear to me, and I suspect it is corrupt.
